bio: I am an onchain software engineer. I build open tools for creators on OP.
contributionDescription:
Software Engineer: Onchain Solutions for Creators

Problem: Creators face hurdles integrating with blockchain, especially in mobile-first and economically challenging regions.

Solutions:
Onchain Magic (https://onchainmagic.xyz): Simplified onchain media publishing, with gas fees covered. Vital for creators in Latin America.
Onchain Albums: Streamlined smart wallet creation for musicians.
Zora Rewards Leaderboard: Transparent revenue data for Zora Protocol creators.
Relief: A game using Zora's onchain assets, enhancing Heno's album experience.
Additionally, developed infrastructure for Decent.xyz, Defient.co, Mesa & more on OP.

contributionLinks.description: Party Minter for Collectible Drops for Onchain Magic

impactDescription:
Tangible:

$311k+ creator revenue tracked on Leaderboard.
15k+ Creators tracked on Leaderboard.
175+ NFTs minted on OP for games.
50+ contracts on OP mainnets.
Biggest single, collective, OP drop in Argentina.
Educated 1.15k via YouTube on OP development.

Intangible:

Events in Buenos Aires with Blockhouse & Musica W3.
Daily Twitter sessions aiding musicians on OP.
Open-source MIT-Licensed code released.
Facilitated musician entry to blockchain.


Beneficiaries:

Optimists:
Helped Sol Siete, Nena1992, Warroking with OP.

Projects:
Onchain Magic: Mobile publishing.
Onchain Albums: Smart wallets.
Relief: OP video game for Heno.'s album.

Companies:
Boosted Defient with blockchain.
Worked with Decent for NFT purchases.
Aided Zora in onchain media publishing.
